description: Wood Anemone (Anemone nemorosa) is an amazing flower species! With its delicate beauty and attractive appearance, it is a prized addition to any garden. It is an early blooming perennial flower, with white, star-shaped petals that emerge from the center of the plant on slender stems rising from a low rosette of lobed leaves. The leaves appear late in autumn and early spring, and range in color from yellowish green to blue-green. Wood Anemone can be grown in both full sun and shade, and fares well in moist soil. Its beauty and easy adaptability make this species a popular flower to have in any garden.
